J.R.R. Tolkien: editor=William York Tindall (general editor for the series)

column5: articlename=J. R. R. Tolkien (Columbia Essays on Modern Writers, No. 41)

J.R.R. Tolkien: series=Columbia Essays on Modern Writes, Number 41

{{disambig-more: '''''J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is a [[1969]] critical study of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] by Catharine R. Stimpson, then an Assistant Professor of English at [[Wikipedia:Barnard College
J.R.R. Tolkien: Barnard College]]. The booklet consists of a single essay (no chapters), and includes a Selected Bibliography about works by and about Tolkien.
